text: Deals Get great value by snagging this proven Apple MacBook Air for only a fraction of the price. Buying a barely used Apple laptop offers a more affordable way to join the family. Want in? You can purchase a refurbished MacBook Air from 2017 for just $229.97 for a limited time. Refurbished MacBook Air from 2017: A budget Apple laptop First off, the downside. This laptop came out before Apple silicon gave MacBooks unsurpassed power and efficiency. Still, if you need a basic Apple laptop at a budget price, this refurbished MacBook Air from 2017 might work for you.
